scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules && npm ci
scripts.build-with-app: rm -rf ./src/app && test -d ../kanban-app/dist && cp -R ../kanban-app/dist ./src/app && npm run build && cp -R ./src/app ./build/
scripts.build-release: npm run clean && npm run build-with-app
scripts.build-electron: npm run build-with-app && npm run rebuild-electron
scripts.check-git: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); try { const status = execSync('git status --porcelain', {encoding: 'utf8'}); const branch = execSync('git branch --show-current', {encoding: 'utf8'}).trim(); if (branch !== 'master') { console.error('Not on master branch'); process.exit(1); } } catch (e) { console.error('Git check failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.check-app-build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('../kanban-app/dist')) { console.error('kanban-app not built. Run: cd ../kanban-app && npm run build'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.bump: npm run check-git && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.commit-version: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); execSync('git add package.json package-lock.json', {stdio:'inherit'}); execSync('git commit -m \"bump server version to ' + pkg.version + '\"', {stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.release: npm run check-app-build && npm run build-release && npm run bump && npm run commit-version && npm run tag
